name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 29, Nanjing Happy Valley urgently removed all Halloween elements from its shelves. Beijing Shijingshan Park announced the cancellation of its parade performances.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 29, Hangzhou.
The Yuhang Subdistrict Office opened the gate for the construction of Taoyuanli single-family villa area on the wall of the neighboring community, which caused dissatisfaction among the owners of the community and their rights protection.
A large number of stability maintenance personnel were dispatched to the construction site, and black plastic bags were used to cover the cameras.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of October 28, Beijing. A student from Beijing Wudao Art Studio stabbed a classmate next to him with a knife.
According to the contributor, it was because of the approaching unified examination, the studio's high-intensity management, and the very late get out of class time every day, which caused the student to have a mental breakdown.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, blogger "Tie Xiaojun" reported that a Chinese woman "Ye Ting" fled back to China after killing someone in the United States while driving under the influence. A year later, she posted on Xiaohongshu again. 
On the 29th, Tie Xiaojun posted that the post was reported by a user named Ye.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 29 (Release) Hebei. Blogger "Xiaolu" shared a passage from the book "Common Bottom Line": Under unrestrained power, they go left and right, first robbing in the name of the left, then dividing the spoils in the name of the right. In the name of socialism, the private interests of the common people are "public", and in the name of the market economy, they are turned into the private interests of the powerful....
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 29, Huang Wenzhen, a population expert, said: The fewer children you have, the more expensive it is to raise them. He was ridiculed by many netizens.
Netizens replied: "Give birth to more children to serve you as cattle and horses?"
"If the sheep don't give birth to children, the wolf will be angry"
"When you are unemployed after the age of 40 and beg for food with your children, one more child can indeed help you get an extra bowl of rice"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 29, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A netizen posted that he went to a Huawei store to buy a mobile phone today and asked the clerk what the mobile phone processor was. The clerk said it was a "national secret formula". When he checked the configuration online, the CPU column showed: Not announced

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 30, the National Health Commission’s official account “Healthy China” published an article: Four major benefits of having children for women:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 29, Hong Kong media reported that a mainland woman broke into a wedding lunch at a Tsim Sha Tsui hotel without giving a red envelope, and even took a video and posted it on TikTok. At the time of the incident, neither the host nor the guests realized that the internet celebrity was eating for free until the next day. In Hong Kong, people who eat at other people's wedding banquets are called "wedding banquet cockroaches."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a murder case in Melbourne, Australia, was re-opened. A Chinese student killed two Chinese and Korean sex workers within 24 hours. Two years after being arrested, he admitted to manslaughter and his sentence was greatly reduced.
In the winter of 2022, 22-year-old Chinese student Lin Xiaozheng and Chinese prostitute Luo Yuqi had a dispute over fees. During the dispute, Lin Xiaozheng strangled her with his arm. Later, he went to the apartment of Korean prostitute Quan Xianshu and strangled her to death.
Lin Xiaozheng's father said that they lived in the countryside and had a daughter who was the only source of income for the family. After Lin Xiaozheng pleaded guilty, according to local law, the standard sentence for murder is 25 years, with a maximum of life imprisonment. The maximum sentence for manslaughter is 25 years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 29, Zhejiang. A patriotic blogger posted a video saying: Japan committed a brutal massacre in Nanjing. This is Japan's internal affairs. Can't we interfere?
This video caused a lot of dissatisfaction and boycott from netizens. Currently, the blogger's works are no longer visible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 29, New Zealand (publishing IP) blogger "Jason" posted: 
The minimum wage in Shanghai is 2,690 yuan/month, while the minimum social security payment base in 24 years is as high as 7,384 yuan/month. 
Assuming that a worker in Shanghai has a monthly salary of 2,690 yuan, the company has to pay 4,883.79 yuan per month for this minimum wage employee. After deducting insurance, the employee only gets 1,726.38 yuan. In other words, the money received by the employee is not as much as the social security department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Hezbollah appointed a new leader, Naim Qassem.
On October 29, the Israeli Defense Minister posted a message on X saying "It's a temporary appointment, it won't last long" and attached a photo of Naim Qassem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 30, police cars were still parked in rows along Julu Road in Shanghai.
The previously installed railings were not removed.
The police were stationed at the scene as if they were facing a major enemy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Shenzhen, Guangdong. The Internet reported that a 9-year-old female student jumped from a building at Gengzi Shouyi School in Yantian District.
According to the child's father, on the 24th, his daughter was slandered by the school for stealing things and was severely criticized by the class teacher in public. Before school was over that day, his daughter rushed out of the school and ran straight to the community, and jumped from the 31st floor. However, after checking the surveillance, no girl was found to steal.
Afterwards, the class teacher never showed up, and the school was arrogant and tried to settle the matter with 100,000 yuan.
